title: hours
answer: Our restaurant is open from 9 AM to 10 PM every day. Special hours may apply on holidays.

title: Delivery
answer: Yes, we offer delivery through GOJEK

title: Outdoor
answer: Yes, we offer outdoor seating. It is available on a first-come, first-served basis, or you can make a reservation for outdoor seating.
